    • About The Duncan Duo


    If you are looking to start or jumpstart a real estate career, look no further than the Duncan Duo. They have been the #1 Realtors in Tampa Bay for several years running, are the #1 RE/MAX Agents in Florida, #6 in the World, and are the Official Real Estate Agents of The Tampa Bay Lightning. As one of the most respected Realtors in the country, The Duncan Duo have also garnered celebrity endorsements from Barbara Corcoran, Jack Harris, Sean Hannity, Glenn Beck, Ron Diaz and Dave McKay and you can hear their radio show every Sunday at 10am on 970WFLA. In addition, this year they ranked #561 on the Inc5000 list for Americaâs Fastest Growing Privately owned companies, their 2nd year on the list.

    They have a track record of doubling, tripling and quadrupling agent income from their prior Brokerages and have an amazing training and mentoring program for brand new agents to learn the business and get into production quickly. The Duo are regularly looking for great team members to join their team and you can inquire in the message box at the top or by clicking here to apply directly via our recent hiring ads.
